original_text: When King Jehoiakim and all his officers and officials heard his words, the king was determined to put him to death. But Uriah heard of it and fled in fear to Egypt.
korean_text: 여호야김 왕과 그의 모든 용사와 모든 고관이 그의 말을 듣고서 왕이 그를 죽이려 하매 우리야가 그 말을 듣고 두려워 애굽으로 도망하여 간지라

sentences.original_text: When King Jehoiakim heard his words
sentences.korean_translation: 왕 여호야김이 그의 말을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and all his officers and officials heard his words
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 신하와 관원들도 그의 말을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and fled in fear to Egypt
